Keywords: Armor , Ruler , Scientist
Real Name: Unknown
Special Powers
EMOTIONAL MODIFIER: Psycho-Man may start the game with FFFF #s006 Emotional Modifier equipped. When he uses its EFFECT, its effects affect characters within 8 squares instead of 4.
MANIPULATION: Outwit, Shape Change.

fastcat99
Was one of my favorite!!! SI fiigures, now he's one of my favorite FFFF figures. If they remake Psycho Pirate, I'll have a super fun team ready to hit the field again!

February 27, 2021
jdm61802
Played him last night and he is board controlling. A sixteen wide area of modification with no LOS needed, really hurt the other teams and gave me first strike. However, its still a dice game, so when you cannot roll anything over a six, you still cannot win.
February 11, 2021
Goop
The Emotional Modifer is already terrifying but now increasing it to 8 squares becomes even more brutal. He himself is already nasty with a double target incap/MC and outwit. Using the modifier to give everyone within 8 squares battle fury. DAMN! That is like some real Felix Faust level evil and you can do it every turn.
